description: A romantic getaway in the City of Lights, exploring iconic landmarks and savoring French cuisine.

iternaryDetails.title: Day 3: Versailles Day Trip
content: Tour of the Palace of Versailles

details:
Itinerary Description

Experience the magic of Paris with this 3-day romantic getaway. From the iconic Eiffel Tower to the world-renowned Louvre Museum, and a day trip to the magnificent Palace of Versailles, this itinerary offers a perfect blend of Parisian charm and French history.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • Breathtaking views from the Eiffel Tower
  • World-class art at the Louvre Museum
  • Scenic Seine River cruise
  • The opulent Palace of Versailles and its stunning gardens
  • Exquisite French cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious Le Meurice, a 5-star hotel in the heart of Paris, offering stunning views of the Tuileries Garden.

description: An exciting adventure in the vibrant capital of Japan, blending traditional culture with modern attractions.

days.activities: Arrival, Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden visit

details:
Itinerary Description

Immerse yourself in the fascinating blend of modernity and tradition in Tokyo with this 3-day adventure. From tranquil gardens and historic landmarks to bustling city streets, and a day trip to the iconic Mount Fuji, this itinerary offers a rich experience of Japan's culture and natural beauty.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • Relaxing stroll in Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden
  • Panoramic views from Tokyo Tower
  • Cross the famous Shibuya Crossing
  • A scenic day trip to Mount Fuji
  • Delicious Japanese cuisine and authentic local experiences
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious Ritz-Carlton Tokyo, offering breathtaking views of the city skyline and unparalleled comfort in the heart of the city.

description: Experience the rich history, art, and culinary delights of Rome, from ancient ruins to modern gelato.

days.activities: Arrival, Colosseum and Roman Forum tour

iternaryDetails.title: Day 2: Vatican City
content: Visiting all the well known churches

details:
Itinerary Description

Uncover the heart of Italy with this 3-day tour of Rome. From the ancient Colosseum to the Vatican's artistic treasures, you'll experience the perfect blend of history, culture, and cuisine in the Eternal City.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • Walk through the Colosseum and Roman Forum
  • Visit the Vatican and admire the Sistine Chapel
  • Explore the charming Trastevere neighborhood
  • Taste authentic Italian gelato
  • Savor exquisite Italian cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the elegant Hotel de Russie, a luxury 5-star hotel situated near Piazza del Popolo, offering lush gardens and world-class service.

description: Discover the unique architecture, vibrant culture, and delicious tapas of Barcelona.

iternaryDetails.title: Day 2: Sagrada Familia and Gothic Quarter

details:
Itinerary Description

Experience the vibrant culture of Barcelona with this 3-day getaway. From the stunning architecture of the Sagrada Familia to the historic charm of the Gothic Quarter, and a scenic day trip to Montserrat, this itinerary offers an immersive exploration of Spain’s Catalonia region.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • A visit to Gaudí's famous Park Güell
  • The iconic Sagrada Familia
  • Exploring the medieval streets of the Gothic Quarter
  • A day trip to Montserrat and its monastery
  • Delicious Spanish cuisine including tapas and local specialties
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious Hotel Arts Barcelona, a 5-star beachfront hotel offering stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea and the city skyline.

Discover the energy of New York City with this 3-day adventure. From the lights of Times Square to the grandeur of the Statue of Liberty, and the iconic Central Park, you'll experience the best that NYC has to offer.

Stay at the luxurious The St. Regis New York, a 5-star hotel located in the heart of Manhattan, offering upscale amenities and world-class service.

description: Explore the stunning landscapes, beaches, and culture of Sydney, from the Opera House to Bondi Beach.

Day 2: Bondi Beach and Coastal Walk

details:
Itinerary Description

Discover the vibrant city of Sydney with this 3-day adventure. From the iconic Sydney Opera House to the picturesque Bondi Beach and the stunning Blue Mountains, this itinerary offers a perfect blend of urban excitement and natural beauty.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • A guided tour of the world-famous Sydney Opera House
  • Relaxation on the sandy shores of Bondi Beach
  • Scenic Coastal Walk with breathtaking ocean views
  • A full day exploring the majestic Blue Mountains
  • Delicious Australian cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the Sydney Harbour Marriott, a luxurious 5-star hotel offering breathtaking views of the harbour and easy access to Sydney's top attractions.

description: Discover the vibrant culture and stunning beaches of Rio, from Copacabana to Christ the Redeemer.

details:
Itinerary Description

Immerse yourself in the lively spirit of Rio de Janeiro with this 3-day adventure. From the breathtaking views atop Sugarloaf Mountain to the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue and the serene beaches of Copacabana and Ipanema, this itinerary offers a perfect balance of cultural exploration and natural beauty.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • Spectacular views from Sugarloaf Mountain
  • A visit to the awe-inspiring Christ the Redeemer statue
  • Relaxation on the world-famous Ipanema Beach
  • An adventure through the lush Tijuca National Park
  • Delicious Brazilian cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious Copacabana Palace, a historic 5-star hotel overlooking the famous Copacabana Beach, offering refined comfort and elegant amenities.

description: A classic trip to London, exploring history, culture, and iconic landmarks.

iternaryDetails.title: Day 2: Tower of London and Buckingham Palace
content: Free evening to enjoy London's West End

details:
Itinerary Description

Experience the rich history and vibrant culture of London with this 3-day classic adventure. From the iconic London Eye to the historic Tower of London and the grandeur of Windsor Castle, this itinerary is designed to immerse you in the essence of one of the world's most beloved cities.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • Stunning views of the city from the London Eye
  • A guided tour of the historic Tower of London
  • A visit to the majestic Buckingham Palace
  • A day trip to the royal Windsor Castle
  • Delicious British cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at The Savoy, an iconic 5-star hotel that combines luxurious comfort with an excellent location on the banks of the River Thames, close to many of London's key attractions.

description: Explore the vibrant street life, ornate temples, and delicious food of Bangkok.

iternaryDetails.title: Day 2: Grand Palace and River Cruise
content: Free evening to explore Bangkok's night markets

details:
Itinerary Description

Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture and rich history of Bangkok with this 3-day adventure. Explore ornate temples, indulge in delicious street food, and take in the sights of the Grand Palace and the historic city of Ayutthaya, making this trip a feast for the senses.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • A guided tour of the stunning Wat Pho temple
  • Visit to the magnificent Grand Palace
  • A scenic cruise along the Chao Phraya River
  • A day trip to the ancient city of Ayutthaya
  • Authentic Thai cuisine and local delicacies
Accommodation

Stay at The Peninsula Bangkok, a luxurious riverside hotel known for its exceptional service and stunning views of the city, providing the perfect base for your exploration of Bangkok.

description: Experience the imperial culture, stunning architecture, and classical music of Vienna.

iternaryDetails.title: Day 2: Belvedere Palace and Vienna State Opera
content: Free evening to enjoy a classical concert

details:
Itinerary Description

Discover the imperial charm and rich musical heritage of Vienna with this captivating 3-day itinerary. Experience stunning architecture, explore grand palaces, and enjoy classical concerts that make Vienna a cultural hub of Europe.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • A guided tour of Schönbrunn Palace, a UNESCO World Heritage site
  • Visit to the opulent Belvedere Palace
  • An evening at the renowned Vienna State Opera
  • A picturesque day trip to Wachau Valley, famous for its vineyards and charming towns
  • Authentic Viennese cuisine and exquisite dining experiences
Accommodation

Stay at Hotel Sacher, an iconic luxury hotel known for its historic significance and exceptional service, located in the heart of Vienna, providing the perfect base for your exploration of this magnificent city.

description: Discover the ancient wonders of Egypt, including the Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx.

content: Tour of the Valley of the Kings

details:
Itinerary Description

Explore the ancient history of Egypt with this 3-day adventure. From the monumental Pyramids of Giza to the awe-inspiring Valley of the Kings, and bustling markets like Khan El Khalili, this itinerary offers a comprehensive look at Egypt's most iconic landmarks.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • The grand Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx
  • Ancient treasures at the Egyptian Museum
  • A vibrant shopping experience at Khan El Khalili bazaar
  • A day trip to Luxor, home to the Valley of the Kings and Karnak Temple
  • Delicious Egyptian cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious Four Seasons Hotel Cairo, offering comfort and stunning views of the Nile.

description: Explore the rich history and vibrant culture of Istanbul, where East meets West.

iternaryDetails.title: Day 1: Arrival and Hagia Sophia
content: Evening dinner at a local restaurant

iternaryDetails.title: Day 2: Palaces and Bazaars
content: Lunch at a traditional Turkish restaurant

iternaryDetails.title: Day 3: Cappadocia Adventure
content: Hot air balloon ride over the fairy chimneys
Lunch at a local Cappadocian restaurant
Return to Istanbul for a farewell dinner

details:
Itinerary Description

Discover the vibrant culture of Istanbul, where East meets West. This 3-day journey takes you through historical landmarks like Hagia Sophia, the majestic Topkapi Palace, and the bustling Grand Bazaar. You'll also enjoy a magical day trip to the stunning landscapes of Cappadocia.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • Marvel at Hagia Sophia's architectural splendor
  • Explore the palatial Topkapi Palace
  • Shop for treasures at the Grand Bazaar
  • Experience Cappadocia's fairy chimneys and underground cities
  • Savor authentic Turkish cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious Ciragan Palace Kempinski, a 5-star hotel on the Bosphorus with breathtaking views of Istanbul.

description: Experience the modern marvels and rich heritage of Singapore, from Gardens by the Bay to Little India.

details:
Itinerary Description

Immerse yourself in the vibrant city of Singapore with this 3-day journey. From the iconic Marina Bay Sands to the exciting Sentosa Island, this itinerary blends modern attractions with Singapore's rich heritage.

  • Panoramic views from Marina Bay Sands SkyPark
  • Thrilling rides at Universal Studios Singapore
  • Exploring the cultural heart of Chinatown

  • Indulging in Singapore's diverse cuisine

Stay at the luxurious Marina Bay Sands, one of the most iconic hotels in the world, with its rooftop infinity pool and breathtaking views of the city skyline.

  • Breathtaking views from the Burj Khalifa

Discover the charm of Amsterdam with this 3-day trip that highlights the city's iconic canals, world-class museums, and historic landmarks. Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture while staying at the luxurious Hotel Pulitzer.

  • Visit the historic Anne Frank House
  • Explore masterpieces at the Van Gogh Museum and Rijksmuseum

  • Wandering through the ancient streets of Alfama

content: Day trip to the Demilitarized Zone (DMZ)

details:
Itinerary Description

Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture and history of Seoul with this 3-day getaway. From exploring ancient palaces to visiting modern attractions like N Seoul Tower, this itinerary blends the best of Seoul's past and present. A day trip to the famous Demilitarized Zone (DMZ) will add a unique historical experience to your journey.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • Explore the grandeur of Gyeongbokgung Palace
  • Stroll through the traditional Bukchon Hanok Village
  • Get panoramic views of the city from N Seoul Tower
  • Take a fascinating day trip to the DMZ
  • Savor delicious Korean cuisine
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious The Shilla Seoul, a 5-star hotel renowned for its excellent service and prime location, offering a perfect base to explore the city.

description: Immerse yourself in the rich traditions, stunning temples, and serene gardens of Kyoto.

iternaryDetails.title: Day 1: Arrival and Fushimi Inari Shrine
content: Dinner at a traditional Kaiseki restaurant

iternaryDetails.title: Day 2: Temples and Bamboo Grove
content: Lunch at a local tea house
Free evening to explore Gion district

iternaryDetails.title: Day 3: Castles and Philosophical Walk
content: Farewell dinner at a Michelin-starred restaurant

details:
Itinerary Description

Explore the tranquil beauty of Kyoto with this 3-day cultural immersion. Discover iconic temples, scenic gardens, and the historic Philosopher's Path, while enjoying the best of traditional Japanese cuisine and hospitality.

What You'll Experience on This Trip
  • The vibrant Fushimi Inari Shrine with its iconic torii gates
  • The Golden Pavilion and serene Arashiyama Bamboo Grove
  • Historical insights at Nijo Castle
  • A reflective walk along the Philosopher's Path
  • Exceptional dining at traditional and Michelin-starred restaurants
Accommodation

Stay at the luxurious The Ritz-Carlton Kyoto, a 5-star hotel offering views of the Kamogawa River and nearby mountains.

  • Breathtaking views from the CN Tower

  • Charming cobblestone streets of the Distillery District

Stay at the luxurious Shangri-La Toronto, located in the heart of the city.
